storyInfo: The clash between Projekt Red and Lunacub unexpectedly causes a crash between Sommer's truck and Leontuzzo's limo. Facing down Projekt Red once again, the enraged Lyudmila chases her alone.

attributes.content: ...That's the gist of it, Lyudmila. Told you everything I know.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: What're you delivering for the Venezias?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: It's a batch of tires tonight.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: It's usually stuff for making vehicles. Originium engines, steel, alloys, things like that. At times there's also frozen fins, frozen meat, booze, meds...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: It's pretty common in other Siracusan cities. Goods the famiglie buy don't have to go through normal customs, so they save a lot on taxes. But here in Nuova Volsinii—
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I get it. No need to go into detail.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: This isn't your first time, is it?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Err... Lyudmila, did you hang back from joining tonight's film shoot because of me?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: When did you figure me out?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Why the hell d'you keep following us?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Look, sorry, but Ruggiero and I are really busy here! Would you mind leaving?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: So busy you can't even stop for a cup of coffee?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: C'mon, Sommer, Ruggiero, lighten up!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: This is Nuova Volsinii! We're all citizens here, and we're going to be rubbing shoulders for quite a while longer. Gotta talk to one another, y'know?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: How about we set up a caffè across from your camp? With that many drivers, business would be booming, and it'd be easy for us to meet up—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The hell's going on *cough* *cough* Where's all this smoke coming from? My eyes, gah—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Merda! Which of you stronzi hit me?!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Ouch—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Sommer! Ruggiero!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: W-We don't know who did it either! We're all the way over here, and we haven't moved an inch...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: And you know we can't do Arts...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I heard the reason why this plate was put out on the border of the city, and why City Hall didn't do anything with it until they let us set up our camp, is 'cause it used to—
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: S-Stop talking crap already. I'll let you two off this time.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...Now I remember.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: We never had a chance to know you better until you helped us out of that bind that time. Everyone started to talk to you, asking you about what the hell your mysterious Arts are, and your experiences in Ursus...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: A famiglia associate's not going to come looking for you just because they 'don't like the look of your face'.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: They kept pestering you after that. Why didn't you tell me, Sommer?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Does Eirene know?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I need to get Guri her treatment and bring her over to Nuova Volsinii. I need this money, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: And what use would telling you have been? They're a pack of rabid wolves who won't give up until they catch their prey. I'm not going to bring that sort of trouble onto the association.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: We're a band of brothers and sisters living together. But we're just ordinary people, nothing more.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: The faces of the drivers flash through Lyudmila's mind one after another. She doesn't say anything.
Hey, you didn't tell Lyudmila, did you?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Don't worry, she's in her tent right now!
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: She's never taken off that mask since she arrived here, and she sometimes frowns when... Breaks my heart, it does.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: You're telling me. I've been holding back from smoking these past few days she's been around. It's killing me.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Quick, light up already—
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: L-Lyudmila...
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Scusa, scusa! We're about to do a night delivery, so we were just gonna have a pre-drive smoke to pick ourselves up—or not! No smoking is fine! We'll put them out right away!
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Err... If you want to smoke, go ahead. No need to hide it from me.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Well, everyone thought you wore the mask because you've got a weak throat or something... Your crystals are in a pretty peculiar place, you know. Us drivers smoke a lot, so we thought...
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: You're overthinking things.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Well, we just hope you like it here, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: You'd better get off and wait at that intersection coming up. We're about to arrive, and there'll be trouble with the Venezias if I show up with a rando in tow.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Lyudmila...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Enough. I got on your truck, so I'll stick with you all the way.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Thanks, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: No matter what happens, I'm lucky to have you with me.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Hmmhmm♪ Hmmhmmhmm♪ Hmm♪
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You've been listening to this song on loop for a while now. Not tired of it?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Of course not!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: 'A Chance Encounter' is an amazing song, and Sora's got one hell of a singing voice!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: It's the hottest new single this week. There was an interview saying she recorded it just for Carnevale.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: 'A chance encounter'... Now I'm not a cultured man, but these words... Don't you think they're about people like us?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You're going to leave, aren't you, Lyudmila?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Eh? What?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You said you didn't have any family or friends left in Siracusa, and no place to go. Everyone at camp will be happy to have someone as interesting as you stick around.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Eirene and I have talked it over before, but I feel like you're not going to stay with us at the Union forever...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: There's doubt in your eyes, and hate, but I don't know who they're for.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Do you still remember what you were like when you first saw Eirene?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I don't remember anything worth mentioning.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I woke up in the camp, and you and Eirene were standing in front of me...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The moment you saw her, your expression changed in an instant... Though it went back real quick.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You thought she was someone else, didn't you?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I might have been a bit light-headed when I woke up.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: A Lupo woman wearing a red hoodie, protective gear around her neck... Eirene really does remind me of someone I hate.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Doesn't matter if it's in Yan or Siracusa, every time I run into that girl, I get struck by a bout of bad luck.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: So that's how it is.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I'm not going to ask you if those stories of Ursus are ones you heard from elsewhere or ones you experienced yourself, Lyudmila. No need for us to argue over who's more unlucky in life, either...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: This really is a chance encounter between two sfortunati, haha.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Eirene always says life will show how much it cares for people with bad luck, it's just running a bit late is all.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Lyudmila says nothing in response. As the truck turns past the intersection, she turns her head to look out the window on a whim—
That's—
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Cazzo! The steering wheel's not working all of a sudden—
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Sommer, look out! There's a car over there—
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: True wolf. Finally found you.
You will not get away.
Hey! Can't you see there's people in there? Your knife and my arrow blew out their tires. Shouldn't we save them?
Oh.
You're right, Agnese. We shouldn't get distracted during a hunt.
A splitting headache pounds against the inside of Lyudmila's skull.
She yanks off her seat belt and pushes open the truck door, falling from her seat as she does. As her face plants into the ground, she sees a familiar red silhouette fade down the intersection.
*cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Before the dizziness disperses, before she can take stock of the situation, before she can check on Sommer... Rage. An unending rage washes over her like the tide.
What the hell's with this bad luck?! How come it's you again?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You goddamn lupetta!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I've handled tougher fights in the Siracusa of old with many more people on the other end.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But I'm always the last one standing. No exceptions.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Don't treat humans like beasts. Your hunting skills won't work on me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You can certainly continue to try. Same goes for you, 'Projekt Red'.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I'll find you.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: My blade... not sharp enough...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You can't hide from me forever. I won't wait any longer for Vargo's answers.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I lost. To the Vulpo out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Damned pup!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Think you can just walk away after I finally found you?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You again?!
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Lyudmila brandishes her knife once again, but Projekt Red nimbly dodges it. A heavy kick immediately slams into her back. Her arm is pinned down, and her knife clatters onto the ground.
By the time she can react, she is already being pressed down into the dirt.
Ugh—Agh—
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The rough scraping of her face against the ground bring a memory to the forefront of her mind—
In the alleys of Lungmen, she was held down by the same damnable wolf pup, unable to resist then either.
The same sorry figure pressed against the ground, the same pain shooting through her body.
Gah! My arm! Let go of me! Pizdets! Vaffanculo!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You stronza! I nearly had my revenge in Lungmen. Why'd you have to get between me and Kal'tsit?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Maestro couldn't fight any more, so why'd you kill her?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Why the hell do you keep showing up over and over again?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Why can't I kill you?! Why?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: (Bares teeth in irritation)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...I remember you.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I hunt wolves. You're not a true wolf. No need to kill you.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Kal'tsit said we shouldn't kill a homeless hyena. You're in pain. Kal'tsit doesn't want me to kill you.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Grandma's waiting for me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I don't have time to waste. I need to find the last true wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Don't get in my way again. I've left Rhodes Island. I'm not listening to Kal'tsit any more...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The Lupo clad in a red hoodie stays for not a moment longer, disappearing down the depths of the alley.
Lyudmila doesn't get up. She lies against the ground, cradling her near-dislocated arm, waiting for the pain and humiliation to seep in and drown her.
She suddenly remembers Sommer's words.
This really is a chance encounter between two sfortunati, haha.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Eirene always says life will show how much it cares for people with bad luck, it's just running a bit late is all.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You sure about that, Sommer?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Sommer... Oh right, Sommer...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Dammit, I got so caught up in chasing that stupid wolf pup... I forgot Sommer's still in the truck...
attributes.name: Lyudmila
